summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the shoreline management program; authorizing an amendment of the Coastal Zone Management Contract between the City and the State of Washington Department of Ecology to provide for enforcement activity under said program, establishing one position of Analyst, Environmental, Associate, conditionally increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1977 Budget of the Building Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
committee: Parks and Public Grounds and Human Resouces and Operations
